name: places/ChIJq0QXVolZwokRmHxIQv6frB4
formattedAddress: 44 Mercer St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 44 Mercer St, New York, NY 10013, USA

editorialSummary.text: Rustic-chic showroom offering a range of high-end eco-conscious mattresses & bedding products.

originalText.text:
(We ordered from Keetsa online, but when I wanted to write a review, they said tagging the NY Store was the best way :)  After a recommendation from a friend, we ordered the Pillow Plus.  When it arrived it seemed to take awhile to "unfold" - there was a crease that never really went away.  We gave it a few good months and then eventually reached out because it was clear that the mattress was defective.

Omar at customer service was responsive to every single email (within 24 hours, every time) and walked us through the process of what photos to take to send to their team to see if it was actually defective.  Bad news: it was a defective mattress.  GREAT news:  Keetsa immediately gave us options to replace it at no cost, to get a different style (obviously we would pay the difference if it was more), or for a refund.  We opted for the exact same mattress.  It was delivered within that week, and it's a game changer.  The new (not defective!) mattress is amazing.  The delivery folks set it up for us and took the old mattress away.

Not everyone stands behind their products like Keetsa.  Not to mention the kindness and timeliness in their responses!  Plus, our new mattress is perfect.  I would recommend this company to anyone :)

originalText.text: Incredible service- Josh was fantastic. Struck the perfect balance of being attentive while giving us space to explore which mattress which work best for us. Very knowledgeable too. Gave the impression he was genuinely happy to work there and to be helpful, without any pretense. Plus we were lucky enough to be there for their 20% off sale in May! And free delivery also, with super easy set up at home. I had a Keetsa mattress about 9 years ago in a different state and we were excited to get one here in New York. We left feeling excited about our new mattress, confident we made the right decision, and assured if any questions or issues came up we’d know exactly where to turn. Thank you Keetsa (and especially Josh)!

originalText.text:
I bought my first KEETSA mattress 6 years ago and it was wonderful. It held up well through the years and moves. It was the perfect balance of firm with an added pillow top.

Recently, I purchased the exact same mattress but this time a different size. This time around it does not have the same comfort. I feel like it’s too firm even with the pillow top. I’m satisfied with the quality but not fully satisfied with the comfort.

I bought my first KEETSA mattress 6 years ago and it was wonderful. It held up well through the years and moves. It was the perfect balance of firm with an added pillow top.

Recently, I purchased the exact same mattress but this time a different size. This time around it does not have the same comfort. I feel like it’s too firm even with the pillow top. I’m satisfied with the quality but not fully satisfied with the comfort.

originalText.text:
You simply will not find a better value or more pleasant buying experience. Shane is extremely knowledgeable on both products offered and how to match with your sleep style. I felt very confident making the purchase with their return policy. I tried mattresses at a big box store and would've had to spend more than double there to find major brand that felt nearly as good as the Keetsa.

TLDR- This place is a hidden gem of quality and value despite its SOHO location.

Thanks Shane!

originalText.text: Love my Keetsa mattress and frame, and the pillow helped me so much. But mostly am really grateful to Shane at the Soho location, who helped me navigate finding the correct mattress and then a shipping issue when I needed help. Would highly recommend!
